what: the option to open records directly in edit mode.
why: to allow quicker access to edit records without needing to open them in view mode first.

what: the option add new records in different ways.
why: to provide more ways to add a new record (same tab, new tab, modal).

what: the option to set which text fields are wrapped in record list.
why: to allow the user to control how fields are displayed in the record list.

what: visibility conditions to page blocks.
why: to allow the user to control when a page block is visible.

what: autocompletion to compose expression editors, workflow text editors and branding css editor.
why: to provide the user with autocompletion for easier editing.

what: the option to add new records from Record Selector editor fields.
why: to allow the user to add new records directly from the Record Selector.

what: the option to configure record list filter with the record filter UI.
why: to provide the user with a more user-friendly way to configure record list filters.

what: the option to configure record block field wrapping.
why: to allow the user to control how fields are displayed in the record block(wrap, no wrap).

what: tables to rich text editor
why: to provide the user with the ability to use tables in rich text.

what: the option to disable save notifications on record pages.
why: to allow the user to hide notications when saving records.

what: inline filtering based on record value to compose record list blocks.
why: to allow the user to filter the record list based on certain record value without having to type the value.

what: live filters to compose chart blocks.
why: to allow the user to filter the chart without editing it.

what: permissions that control if namespace(s)/module(s)/chart(s) can be exported.
why: to allow the user to control who can export data.
NOTE: make sure to review the permissions and adjust them when upgrading.
